attributes.action: deny treatment to patients who carry on smoking after a life threatening illness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe people who have suffered from a life threatening illness, for example a heart attack or a stroke, who continue to smoke after should not be given treatment from the NHS. Why should people so selfish use the NHS funds and resources because they cannot find the will power to kick the habit? The NHS should be there to help people who maintain a healthy lifestyle not for people who are basically digging their own grave.
